name: LogScale
description: LogScale is a log management platform that provides real-time log analysis, search, and visualization.

options.name: LogScale URL
options.description: The base URL for the LogScale API including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Data Sources
options.description: A comma delimited list of LogScale repositories to query.  The default is all repositories.

options.name: LogScale Query
options.description: The query to run against LogScale.

options.name: Start of Search Window
options.description: Earliest time to search for logs.  Defaults to 7 days.
